data: Vladimir Drachev, Ph.D Vladimir Drachev, Ph.D Associate Professor 940-565-4580 Vladimir.Drachev@unt.edu SRB 240 http://physics.unt.edu/~Drachev-Research/ Novosibirsk State University, Institute of Semiconductor Physics Russian Academy of Sciences, 1995 Ph.D. Research interest: optics and spectroscopy, nonlinear optics, nanotechnology, nanophotonics, ultrafast optics, nanomaterials.
